SEARCH
Package pegasus.grid

Interface AtomicGrid<T>

Type Parameters:
T - The type of object of which to reference
All Superinterfaces:
BaseGrid<T>, BinaryIndexedIterable<T>, Grid<T>, Iterable<T>, Serializable
All Known Implementing Classes:
AtomicArrayGrid
public interface AtomicGrid<T> extends Grid<T>
A reference-based grid which utilizes atomic references to ensure thread safety.
See Also:
  • BaseGrid
  • Grid

    T
    getAndSet(int r, int c, T value)

  • Method Details

    • of

      static <T> AtomicGrid<T> of(T[][] values)
      Creates a new atomic grid containing the provided values.
      Type Parameters:
      T - The type of object to contain
      Parameters:
      values - The rectangular array of values
      Returns:
      The constructed atomic grid
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - When the array is not rectangular
      NullPointerException - When the array contains a null row

    • getAndUpdate

      T getAndUpdate(int r, int c, UnaryOperator<T> operator) throws BinaryIndexOutOfBoundsException
      Caches the value at the specified index of this grid in memory, updates the value, then returns the cached value.
      Parameters:
      r - The index of the row to update
      c - The index of the column to update
      operator - The update function of which to apply
      Returns:
      The ith value of this grid before the update
      Throws:
      BinaryIndexOutOfBoundsException - When the provided index is out of bounds
      NullPointerException - When the provided update function is null

    • updateAndGet

      T updateAndGet(int r, int c, UnaryOperator<T> operator) throws BinaryIndexOutOfBoundsException
      Updates the value at the specified index of this grid, then returns the post-update value.
      Parameters:
      r - The index of the row to update
      c - The index of the column to update
      operator - The update function of which to apply
      Returns:
      The ith value of this grid after the update
      Throws:
      BinaryIndexOutOfBoundsException - When the provided index is out of bounds
      NullPointerException - When the provided update function is null

    • getAndSet

      T getAndSet(int r, int c, T value) throws BinaryIndexOutOfBoundsException
      Caches the value at the specified index of this grid in memory, set the value, then returns the cached value.
      Parameters:
      r - The index of the row to set
      c - The index of the column to set
      value - The value of which to set to
      Returns:
      The ith value of this grid before assignment
      Throws:
      BinaryIndexOutOfBoundsException - When the provided index is out of bounds
